Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FilmArray Warrior Control Panel M290, an external positive and negative quality control panel for monitoring performance of nucleic acid testing of biothreat agents on the FilmArray NGDS Warrior Panel assay.
Indications for Use Summary: For use as external positive and negative assayed quality controls to monitor performance of in vitro laboratory nucleic acid testing for detection of Bacillus anthracis, Coxiella burnetii, Francisella tularensis, Yersinia pestis, Ebola virus, and Marburg virus on the FilmArray NGDS Warrior Panel using the FilmArray 2.0 system.
